results.content: As for me it is very bad idea forcing to use online IDE like Cloud9.io instead of showing examples on real IDE (like Visual Studio or Web/PHPStorm). I don't want to be registered on this resource and especially to provide credit card data them, but in order to follow you and understand your course I have to do it.  If I started this course earlier I would ask for refund (my mistake). To many explanations and introductions and to less coding itself.
